Package it.polimi.ingsw.common.models

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.common.models.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Displayable, java.io.Serializable 
    public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
implements Displayable, java.io.Serializable
    In this class all the information about the state of a player, like name, position, items owned etc...
    See Also:

      • isPointAtMaxDistanceInDirection

        public boolean isPointAtMaxDistanceInDirection​(@Nullable
                                               @Nullable java.awt.Point point,
                                               @NotNull
                                               @NotNull Cell[][] cells,
                                               int maxDistance,
                                               @NotNull
                                               Bounds.Direction direction)
        Determines if a point of the map is at a certain distance from this player in a certain direction
        Parameters:
        point - the point
        cells - the map
        maxDistance - the distance
        direction - the direction
        Returns:
        true if the point is attainable from the position of this player with at most "maxDistance" steps, in "direction" direction, false otherwise

      • getFrontImage

        @NotNull
public @NotNull java.awt.image.BufferedImage getFrontImage()
                                                    throws java.io.IOException
        Description copied from interface: Displayable
        Get the front image associated. Each call read the image from fs and store it in an BufferedImage, so there is a delay when the method is invoked.
        Specified by:
        getFrontImage in interface Displayable
        Returns:
        The image associated.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown when there was a problem during the reading.
